name: Soul Carrier
description:
Soul Carrier

Carry the souls of the fallen to the heavens!

Controls:

  • Drag around the Cloud with the mouse.
  • You can Zoom In/Out with the mouse scrollwheel.

Some tips for the beginner Soul Carrier:

  • Try to maintain the souls on top of the cloud and tread lightly!
  • Don't use too much force, you could damage the souls!
  • "Patientia Sit Virtus". Take it easy and you will succeed!
  • Have fun!
